verses.verse: I love the LORD because he has heard my voice and listened to my cry for mercy,[b]
because he has inclined his ear to me on the day when I called out to him.[c]
The bonds of death[d] encompassed me; the snares of the netherworld held me tightly. I was seized by distress and sorrow.
Then I cried out in the name[e] of the LORD: “O LORD, I entreat you to preserve my life.”
Gracious is the LORD and righteous; our God is merciful.
The LORD watches over his little ones;[f] when I was brought low, he saved me.
Be at peace once again, O my soul, for the LORD has shown mercy to you.
He has delivered my soul[g] from death, my eyes from tears, and my feet from stumbling.
I will walk in the presence of the LORD in the land of the living.[h]
I believed; therefore, I said,[i] “I am greatly afflicted.”
In my dismay I cried out, “All men are liars.”[j]
How can I repay the LORD for all the good he has done for me?
I will lift up the cup of salvation[k] and call on the name of the LORD.
I will fulfill my vows[l] to the LORD in the presence of his people.
Precious in the eyes of the LORD is the death[m] of his faithful ones.
O LORD, I am your servant. I am your servant, the child of your handmaid;[n] you have loosed my bonds.
I will offer you a sacrifice of thanksgiving and call on the name of the LORD.
I will fulfill my vows to the LORD in the presence of all his people,
in the courts of the house of the LORD, in your midst, O Jerusalem. Alleluia.[o]
